One day later , patient receive iodine I 131 monoclonal antibody TNT-1/B interstitially approximately 24 hour . At select center , 3 additional group 3 patient receive study drug 48 hour . Catheters remove 1 day completion infusion . A gadolinium enhance MRI perform week 8 . Patients partial response , minimal response , stable disease repeat treatment week 9 .
